text: @toryboypierce @COVID19 @MattHancock Why should there be blame? They set a target & may not have reached it 81000+ tests yesterday, who know how many more today! Does it matter No. Will it mean more people die, probably not. It’s just another reason for all the Tory haters & woke #FBPE loonies to have a whinge!
